devDependencies.ms: Needed for semantic-release for some reason. See https://github.com/EvHaus/react-pdf-charts/blob/dev/package.json
devDependencies.semantic-release: Need to lock to pre-23.0.0 until oven-sh/setup-bun supports Node 20+, otherwise 'Release' builds fail with '[semantic-release]: node version >=20.8.1 is required. Found v18.19.0.'
